captions.text:
The following test was carried out
by professionals on closed-off streets

No trucks were harmed
in the making of this film

The bulls have retired
to a farm outside Guadalajara

The test was set up to demonstrate
the manoeuvrability of the new Volvo FL

comments.text:
bulls can see red but they probably can't distinguish it from green. They 
only have one visual pigment in that part of the spectrum, ... 
www.thenakedscientists.com/HTML/questions/question/1336/
So, they do not exactly see everything in black and white.
